name: Fractal Mascot
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Relative Density
entries: The fractal can move through creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Quantum Strike
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1 damage) force damage, or 6 (2d4 + 1 damage) force damage if the fractal is Medium or bigger.
